contents.text: Welcome to Shopify in San Francisco, your e-commerce partner for selling online, in store, on social media, or anywhere you choose.
For online store and social media sales support, press 1.
For help with your online store, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an online store support specialist.

navigationGoals: My website’s checkout page is failing to process orders; I need help fixing it.
I need help adding and customizing a veteran-owned badge on my online storefront theme
Optimize my Shopify online store’s Liquid theme for faster load times using CDN integration and GraphQL queries.
I need help updating my online store’s homepage layout; I’m not sure how to make my text and images look right.
Help me organize my physics demonstration kits into a new collection on my online store.

contents.text: For help with social media sales, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a social media sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to integrate and tag my products in my Facebook/Instagram shop posts.
I want to link my Instagram account so customers can purchase directly through my posts
Configure and debug the Shopify–Facebook Channel and Meta Pixel with Conversion API for Instagram Shopping.
I want to link my Instagram business account so customers can shop my crafts directly from my posts.
I need to integrate my physics-themed T-shirts with Instagram Shopping.

contents.text: For in-store and mobile sales support, press 2.
For point-of-sale hardware and in-store support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a point-of-sale support specialist.

navigationGoals: My new in-store card reader won’t pair with the POS; I need assistance connecting it.
My in-store card reader isn’t working and I need help troubleshooting the POS hardware
Troubleshoot Bluetooth pairing and firmware update for my Shopify POS card reader on iPad.
I need step-by-step help setting up the new card reader in my boutique to accept payments.
Assist me in pairing my new card reader to Shopify POS at our campus physics club store.

contents.text: For pop-up or trunk-of-your-car sales support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a mobile sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to configure my mobile card reader for pop-up events, including offline transactions.
I need assistance setting up a mobile checkout system for my pop-up market events
Set up Shopify POS Go’s offline mode and cellular connectivity for mobile pop-up sales.
I’m selling at a community fair and need guidance on using my phone and mobile reader for on-the-go checkouts.
I want to enable offline mode on my card reader for a pop-up sale at the physics department fair.
